categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the New Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: An avian was a male Jedi student at Luke Skywalker's Jedi Praxeum on Yavin 4 in 12 ABY. He was present in the Temple of the Blueleaf Cluster when Kyp Durron and Dorsk 81 returned to Yavin 4 from the Core Worlds to warn the students of an imminent Imperial attack that began just minutes after their arrival. He did not believe that they could win the battle, due to the enemy's superior numbers.
